reviewText: Leo may have passed, but his ideas about shooting trap live on.  I really liked his videos.  He speaks in simple terms and shows you how he shoots.  Since I watched these videos, my ATA scores have improved.  I highly recommend these videos.

My favorite quote 'Hard hits put joy in my heart'. Top Quality production as expected from Sunrise. When you want to be the best seek knowledge from the very best.  Something in this video for every level.  From new user safety to how to prepare for competition. Get the 2 DVD set.

Very good videos. The instructional parts on where to hold and foot position is very good.
You can watch these videos over and over and learn something new everytime.

Definitely worth the money
